text: <@UF6M5BW4C> - You can clone files, modules, and templates between portals now via file manager: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/articles/kcs-article/cos-general/how-do-i-copy-a-blog-email-page-template-from-one-portal-to-another>
We're exploring ways to make it easier to transfer/update assets (especially in bulk) between portals. Hope to see some updates in 2019, but the teams are early in exploring what to build.
